item.description:
GAME ON PEOPLE!! It's an exciting time for hockey fans! I'll be watching Game 1 at Pearl Street Station in Malden.  Come on down!! Pearl Street is conveniently located 1 block from the Malden Center Orange Line Station.  They have plenty o' space, and plenty o' tvs.  I'll be there at about 7:30pm or so. Puck drops at 8pm.

 

This meetup is crosslisted with Boston Happy Hour.  Everyone is responsible for their own food and drinks.  Please pay as you go or maintain your own tab.  Thanks!
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture. You can ask for me in the bar area.
item.name: Stanley Cup Game 1 Viewing Party
